attributes.action: Get Jonjo Shelvey on the plane to Russia
attributes.additional_details:
He can spray a ball anywhere
He’s not Ill-disciplined as previously touted, having not been booked in 2018
attributes.background: Jonjo Shelvey, massively under-rated creative English Midfielder needs to be on the plane to the Russian World Cup to give us a sliver of a chance. Let’s get him there!
